author: bodewig
msg: <chmod> is different from other directory based tasks as it only
operates on the dir attribute and not on a fileset rooted at dir

author: sbailliez
msg: Dump some properties from Xalan to check for various XML/XSL/JAXP
information. Hopefuly this will give additional details when running GUMP
or running unit tests and figure out problems.
